0: The hotel needs to be renovated

We mentioned that the air conditioning in our room was not working properly they sent an Engineer to look at it and he was unable to repair it so the hotel staff suggested to us to move to another room
Room was desperately in need of refurbishment
Had to call maintenance toilets not flushing
However the hotel needs a facelift
Rooms need renovation breakfast could be better
The next morning was surprised that the club lounge was closed as they suddenly decided to start renovating the 7th floor
Very small shower cubicle with make do shower curtain in need of refurb

1: Lovely hotel the refurbishment is amazing and a lovely espresso martini in the Pine Bar
In addition the refurbishment is excellent and the hotel very well placed
We had a fabulous visit to this newly renovated Mayfair hotel
Beautifully refurbished hotel with excellent service and great location
Great location very clean helpful staff recently refurbished I really love my stay at this hotel
The Hotel has been recently refurbished to an exceptional standard the rooms are spacious and attractively designed
I was recommended by a friend to stay at this hotel as it was renewly renovated and indeed the hotel is high standard and very elegent
The new updated hotel is terrific
Lovely updated hotel with great staff
